name: Potato and Corn Salad with Roasted Peppers & Chorizo Vinaigrette
description: This hearty salad is quick and easy to make and uses ingredients that you likely already have in the kitchen. Feel free to substitute the chorizo with an Italian hot sausage or some chopped, cooked bacon.
